actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the conveyance to the State of Ohio for wildlife management purposes of certain lands acquired for the Big Darby Lake, Ohio, project.

summary.text: Grants all interest of the United States to specified lands acquired for the Big Darby Lake Flood Control Project to the State of Ohio subject to a reversion should such lands cease to be administered for wildlife management purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the conveyance to the State of Ohio for wildlife management purposes of certain lands acquired for the Big Darby Lake, Ohio, project.
